Name: Slendro 1
Reference: H. Rechberger. Scales and Modes Around the World: The Complete Guide to the Scales and Modes of the World. Fennica Gehrman Ltd., 2018
Notes: It is not clear which instrument these tunings came from, but the fact that the tunings are given to an accuracy of 1 cents, is in line with other instrument tunings.

Name: Mawam Yakah Bayati
Reference: H. Rechberger. Scales and Modes Around the World: The Complete Guide to the Scales and Modes of the World. Fennica Gehrman Ltd., 2018
